title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Statement to the House of Commons on COP27
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, in the House of Commons on 9 November 2022.
content:
With permission, Mr Speaker, I will make a statement on COP27 which I attended in Sharm El Sheikh on Monday.
